Sloane Sterling

Creator • Athlete • Influencer

Sloane Sterling blends elite fitness, digital entrepreneurship, and creative innovation. With hands-on experience in e-commerce, drop shipping, and storefront development, she’s building the LuxeSculpt™ performance brand from the ground up — merging technology, fashion, and functional design into a new era of precision activewear. Her mission: to empower creators and athletes to move, build, and live with purpose.
